content: I'm thinking of allowing exceptions for Rachel's social media profile and a few other important accounts, so I can stay updated on their content. Besides prioritizing self-care and setting boundaries, I also learned about the importance of mindfulness and meditation from the workshop on February 27. I've been trying to incorporate a daily meditation practice into my routine, but I'm struggling to find a quiet and comfortable spot at home. Do you have any recommendations for creating a peaceful meditation space?
